"accent-inherit: accent-color: inherit; accent-current: accent-color: currentColor; accent-transparent: accent-color: transparent; accent-black: accent-color: var(--color-black); accent-white: accent-color: var(--color-white); accent-color-name: accent-color: var(--color-color-name); accent-(custom-property): accent-color: var(custom-property); accent-[value]: accent-color: value; <input class=\"accent-[#50d71e] ...\" type=\"checkbox\" /> Use hover:accent-* and md:accent-* variants. @theme: Customize color palette, spacing, typography, breakpoints. Example: `@theme { --color-avocado-100: oklch(0.99 0 0); ... }` Arbitrary values: Use `[value]` for pixel-perfect control. Example: `top-[117px]` Arbitrary properties: Use `[property:value]` for unsupported CSS properties. Example: `[mask-type:luminance]` Arbitrary variants: Modify selectors dynamically. Example: `lg:[&:nth-child(-n+3)]:hover:underline` Whitespace in arbitrary values: Use underscore (_) for spaces. Example: `grid grid-cols-[1fr_500px_2fr]` Ambiguity resolution: Use data types (length, color) to clarify ambiguous values. Example: `text-(length:--my-var)` Custom CSS: Add custom styles using `@import \"tailwindcss\"; .my-custom-style { ... }` Base styles: Add classes to <html> or <body> or use `@layer base`. Component classes: Use `@layer components` for reusable components. Custom utilities: Use `@utility` for simple utilities. Example: `@utility content-auto { content-visibility: auto; }` Functional utilities: Use `--value()` to handle arguments. Example: `@utility tab-* { tab-size: --value(--tab-size-*); }` Modifiers: Use `--modifier()` for conditional modifiers. Fractions: Use CSS ratio data type with `--value()`. Custom variants: Use `@variant` for conditional styles. content-normal: normal content-center: center content-start: flex-start content-end: flex-end content-between: space-between content-around: space-around content-evenly: space-evenly content-baseline: baseline content-stretch: stretch items-start: align-items: flex-start; items-end: align-items: flex-end; items-center: align-items: center; items-baseline: align-items: baseline; items-stretch: align-items: stretch; Use breakpoint variants like md:items-center for responsive design. self-auto: align based on container align-items. self-start: align to cross-start. self-end: align to cross-end. self-center: align to cross-center. self-stretch: stretch to cross-fill. self-baseline: align to baseline. animate-spin: spin animation; animate-ping: ping animation; animate-pulse: pulse animation; animate-bounce: bounce animation; animate-none: no animation; animate-[value]: custom animation; motion-safe: conditionally applies animations; motion-reduce: conditionally applies animations; Classes: appearance-none, appearance-auto. Styles: appearance. Description: Reset or restore browser specific element styling, form components. aspect-[ratio] aspect-square aspect-video aspect-auto aspect-(custom-property) aspect-[value] aspect-ratio: Control element aspect ratio. backdrop-filter-none: backdrop-filter: none; backdrop-filter-(custom-property): backdrop-filter: var(custom-property); backdrop-filter-[value]: backdrop-filter: value; Combine blur, brightness, contrast, grayscale, hue-rotate, invert, opacity, saturate, sepia. backdrop-filter-none removes filters. Custom value: backdrop-filter-[value]. CSS var: backdrop-filter-(--var). hover:backdrop-filter-*, md:backdrop-filter-* backdrop-blur-xs: blur(4px); backdrop-blur-sm: blur(8px); backdrop-blur-md: blur(12px); backdrop-blur-lg: blur(16px); backdrop-blur-xl: blur(24px); backdrop-blur-2xl: blur(40px); backdrop-blur-3xl: blur(64px); backdrop-blur-none: backdrop-filter: none; backdrop-blur-(custom-property): blur(var(custom-property)); backdrop-blur-[value]: blur(value); Classes: backdrop-brightness-, backdrop-brightness-(), backdrop-brightness-[]. Purpose: Control backdrop brightness. Custom values and CSS variables supported. Responsive design supported. backdrop-contrast-{number}: backdrop-filter: contrast({number}%); backdrop-contrast-(custom-property): backdrop-filter: contrast(var(custom-property)); backdrop-contrast-[value]: backdrop-filter: contrast(value); Custom value: backdrop-contrast-[value]. CSS var: backdrop-contrast-(--var). Responsive: md:backdrop-contrast-* backdrop-grayscale: backdrop-filter: grayscale(100%); backdrop-grayscale-{number}: backdrop-filter: grayscale({number}%); backdrop-grayscale-(custom-property): backdrop-filter: grayscale(var(custom-property)); backdrop-grayscale-[value]: backdrop-filter: grayscale(value); Custom value: backdrop-grayscale-[value]. CSS var: backdrop-grayscale-(--var). Responsive: md:backdrop-grayscale-* backdrop-hue-rotate-n: backdrop-filter: hue-rotate(n deg); -backdrop-hue-rotate-n: backdrop-filter: hue-rotate(calc(n deg * -1)); backdrop-hue-rotate-(var): uses CSS variable; backdrop-hue-rotate-[value]: uses custom value; Tailwind Backdrop Invert: `backdrop-invert`, `backdrop-invert-{number}`, `backdrop-invert-{custom-property}`, `backdrop-invert-[value]`. Control backdrop color inversion. Custom values and responsive design supported. backdrop-filter opacity: Class names: backdrop-opacity-<number>, backdrop-opacity-(<custom-property>), backdrop-opacity-[<value>]. Controls backdrop filter opacity. Supports custom values and CSS variables. Responsive design supported. ClassStyles backdrop-saturate- backdrop-filter: saturate(%); backdrop-saturate-() backdrop-filter: saturate(var()); backdrop-saturate-[] backdrop-filter: saturate(); Utilities to control backdrop saturation. backdrop-sepia backdrop-sepia-[number] backdrop-sepia-(custom-property) backdrop-sepia-[value] backdrop-filter: sepia() Control the sepia effect on an element's backdrop. backface-hidden: backface-visibility: hidden; backface-visible: backface-visibility: visible; bg-fixed: background-attachment: fixed; bg-local: background-attachment: local; bg-scroll: background-attachment: scroll; bg-blend-normal: background-blend-mode normal bg-blend-multiply: background-blend-mode multiply bg-blend-screen: background-blend-mode screen bg-blend-{mode}: background-blend-mode {mode} bg-clip-border background-clip: border-box; bg-clip-padding background-clip: padding-box; bg-clip-content background-clip: content-box; bg-clip-text background-clip: text; Use bg-clip-border, bg-clip-padding, bg-clip-content to control background bounding box. Use bg-clip-text to clip to text shape. md: applies at medium screen sizes. bg-inherit: Inherits background color. bg-current: Uses currentColor. bg-transparent: Transparent background. Numerous color utilities (e.g., bg-red-500, bg-blue-100). Opacity modifiers (e.g., /100, /50). Custom values: bg-[#hexcode], bg-(--var). Hover and responsive variants supported. Tailwind Background Images: `bg-[value]`, `bg-(image:custom-property)`, `bg-none`, linear gradients (`bg-linear-*`), radial gradients (`bg-radial`), conic gradients (`bg-conic-*`), color stops (`from-*`, `via-*`, `to-*`), gradient positions, interpolation modes. Custom values and responsive design supported. background-origin: Class names: bg-origin-border, bg-origin-padding, bg-origin-content. Controls background rendering area (border-box, padding-box, content-box). Responsive design supported. bg-bottom: bottom; bg-center: center; bg-left: left; bg-left-bottom: left bottom; bg-left-top: left top; bg-right: right; bg-right-bottom: right bottom; bg-right-top: right top; bg-top: top; bg-(position:): var(); bg-[]: . Responsive: md:bg-top. bg-repeat: background-repeat: repeat; bg-repeat-x: repeat-x; bg-repeat-y: repeat-y; bg-repeat-space: space; bg-repeat-round: round; bg-no-repeat: no-repeat; Responsive: md:bg-repeat-x. bg-auto: background-size: auto; bg-cover: cover; bg-contain: contain; bg-[<value>]: background-size: <value>; bg-(length:<custom-property>): background-size: var(<custom-property>); Responsive: md:bg-contain. border-collapse: collapse; border-separate: separate; Collapses borders: border-collapse; Separates borders: border-separate; Responsive design: md:border-separate; border-inherit border-color: inherit; border-current border-color: currentColor; divide-stone-200 > :not(:last-child) border-color: var(--color-stone-200); divide-stone-300 > :not(:last-child) border-color: var(--color-stone-300); divide-stone-400 > :not(:last-child) border-color: var(--color-stone-400); divide-(custom-property) > :not(:last-child) border-color: var(custom-property); divide-[value] > :not(:last-child) border-color: value; border-radius: Class names: rounded-xs-3xl, rounded-none, rounded-full, rounded-(<custom-property>), rounded-[<value>], rounded-{s,e,t,b}-{xs-3xl,none,full,custom,value}. Sets border-radius; supports individual corners and sides. Uses custom values and CSS variables. Responsive design supported. border-spacing-: sets border spacing. border-spacing-x-: sets horizontal border spacing. border-spacing-y-: sets vertical border spacing. border-spacing-[value]: custom value. border-spacing-(custom-property): custom property. border-solid: solid border-dashed: dashed border-dotted: dotted border-double: double border-hidden: hidden border-none: none divide-solid: solid divide-dashed: dashed divide-dotted: dotted divide-double: double divide-hidden: hidden divide-none: none Classes: border, border-number, border-(length:custom-property), border-[value], border-x, border-y, border-s, border-e, border-t, border-r, border-b, border-l, divide-x, divide-y, divide-x-reverse, divide-y-reverse. Styles: border-width, border-inline-width, border-block-width, border-top-width, border-right-width, border-bottom-width, border-left-width. Description: Set border widths for element sides and dividers between children. box-decoration-clone, box-decoration-slice classes set box-decoration-break property. clone: decorations are cloned on each fragment. slice: decorations are continuous. shadow-*: box-shadow: var(--shadow-*); shadow-none: box-shadow: 0 0 #0000; shadow-(color:*): --tw-shadow-color var(--color-*); inset-shadow-*: box-shadow: inset ...; ring: --tw-ring-shadow: 0 0 0 1px; Customize: --shadow-*, --inset-shadow-*, --color-*; Use md: for responsive design. box-border: include border/padding in size. box-content: exclude border/padding from size. break-after-auto: default break. break-after-avoid: avoid break. break-after-page: page break. break-after-column: column break. break-after-left|right|all|avoid-page. Classes: break-before-auto, break-before-avoid, break-before-all, break-before-avoid-page, break-before-page, break-before-left, break-before-right, break-before-column. Styles: break-before. Description: Control page or column breaks before element. break-inside-auto: break-inside: auto; break-inside-avoid: break-inside: avoid; break-inside-avoid-page: break-inside: avoid-page; break-inside-avoid-column: break-inside: avoid-column; Controls column/page break behavior within element. Use md: for responsive design. caption-top: top caption-bottom: bottom caret-inherit: caret-color: inherit; caret-current: caret-color: currentColor; caret-transparent: caret-color: transparent; caret-black: caret-color: var(--color-black); caret-white: caret-color: var(--color-white); caret-red-*: caret-color: var(--color-red-*); caret-orange-*: caret-color: var(--color-orange-*); caret-amber-*: caret-color: var(--color-amber-*); caret-yellow-*: caret-color: var(--color-yellow-*); caret-lime-*: caret-color: var(--color-lime-*); caret-green-*: caret-color: var(--color-green-*); caret-emerald-*: caret-color: var(--color-emerald-*); caret-teal-*: caret-color: var(--color-teal-*); caret-cyan-*: caret-color: var(--color-cyan-*); caret-sky-*: caret-color: var(--color-sky-*); caret-blue-*: caret-color: var(--color-blue-*); caret-indigo-*: caret-color: var(--color-indigo-*); caret-violet-*: caret-color: var(--color-violet-*); caret-purple-*: caret-color: var(--color-purple-*); caret-fuchsia-*: caret-color: var(--color-fuchsia-*); caret-pink-*: caret-color: var(--color-pink-*); caret-rose-*: caret-color: var(--color-rose-*); caret-slate-*: caret-color: var(--color-slate-*); caret-gray-*: caret-color: var(--color-gray-*); caret-zinc-*: caret-color: var(--color-zinc-*); caret-neutral-*: caret-color: var(--color-neutral-*); caret-stone-*: caret-color: var(--color-stone-*); caret-(custom-property): caret-color: var(custom-property); caret-[value]: caret-color: value; Custom value: caret-[value]. CSS var: caret-(--var). Responsive: md:caret-*. clear-left: left; clear-right: right; clear-both: both; clear-start: inline-start; clear-end: inline-end; clear-none: none; Clears left: clear-left; Clears right: clear-right; Clears both: clear-both; Logical properties: clear-start, clear-end; Disables clears: clear-none; Responsive design: md:clear-none; text-inherit: color inherit text-current: color currentColor text-transparent: color transparent text-{color}: color var(--color-{color}) text-[value]: color [value] text-({custom-property}): color var({custom-property}) Color utilities: `bg-*`, `text-*`, `border-*`, etc. Opacity adjustment: `bg-black/75`, `bg-pink-500/[71.37%]`, `bg-cyan-400/(--my-alpha-value)`. Dark mode: `dark:bg-gray-800`. CSS variables: `--color-*`. Custom colors: Use `@theme`. Overriding defaults: redefine theme variables. Disabling defaults: set to `initial` (e.g., `--color-lime-*: initial`). Custom palettes: Use `--color-*: initial` and define your own. scheme-normal color-scheme: normal; scheme-dark color-scheme: dark; scheme-light color-scheme: light; scheme-light-dark color-scheme: light dark; scheme-only-dark color-scheme: only dark; scheme-only-light color-scheme: only light; Use scheme-light, scheme-dark, scheme-light-dark to control element color scheme. dark:scheme-* to apply in dark mode. columns-<number>: sets number of columns; columns-<size>: sets column width; gap-<width>: sets column gap; columns-[<value>]: custom column value; columns-(): custom CSS variable; responsive design via prefixes Tailwind CSS v4.0 requires modern browsers (Chrome 111+, Safari 16.4+, Firefox 128+). Not designed for CSS preprocessors like Sass, Less, or Stylus. Supports CSS variables and nesting. Avoid CSS modules when possible. Vue/Svelte/Astro: style with utility classes directly in markup. content-[<value>]: content: <value>; content-(<custom-property>): content: var(<custom-property>); content-none: content: none; Use with ::before and ::after. content-['Hello_World']; Escaping underscore content-['Hello\\\\_World']; Responsive: md:before:content-['Desktop'] cursor-auto|default|pointer|wait|text|move|help|not-allowed|none|context-menu|progress|cell|crosshair|vertical-text|alias|copy|no-drop|grab|grabbing|all-scroll|col-resize|row-resize|n-resize|e-resize|s-resize|w-resize|ne-resize|nw-resize|se-resize|sw-resize|ew-resize|ns-resize|nesw-resize|nwse-resize|zoom-in|zoom-out: cursor styles. cursor-[value]: custom value. cursor-(custom-property): custom property. Dark Mode: Use dark variant to style for dark mode. <div class=\"bg-white dark:bg-gray-800\">. Override dark variant: @custom-variant dark (&:where(.dark, .dark *));. Use with HTML: <html class=\"dark\">. Data attribute: @custom-variant dark (&:where([data-theme=dark], [data-theme=dark] *));. Use with HTML: <html data-theme=\"dark\">. JavaScript for theme toggling: document.documentElement.classList.toggle(\"dark\", localStorage.theme === \"dark\" || (!(\"theme\" in localStorage) && window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches)); localStorage.theme = \"light\"; localStorage.theme = \"dark\"; localStorage.removeItem(\"theme\"); Tailwind scans for utility classes in source files. It treats files as plain text, not code. Dynamic class names are not supported. Use complete class names. Files in .gitignore, binary files, CSS files, and lock files are ignored. Use `@source` to register additional source paths. Use `source()` to set the base path for scanning. Use `source(none)` to disable automatic detection. inline: display: inline; block: display: block; inline-block: display: inline-block; flow-root: display: flow-root; flex: display: flex; inline-flex: display: inline-flex; grid: display: grid; inline-grid: display: inline-grid; contents: display: contents; table: display: table; inline-table: display: inline-table; table-caption: display: table-caption; table-cell: display: table-cell; table-column: display: table-column; table-column-group: display: table-column-group; table-footer-group: display: table-footer-group; table-header-group: display: table-header-group; table-row-group: display: table-row-group; table-row: display: table-row; list-item: display: list-item; hidden: display: none; sr-only: hides visually, shows screen readers; not-sr-only: reverses sr-only; VS Code IntelliSense plugin: Autocomplete, linting, hover previews, syntax highlighting. Prettier plugin: Sorts classes. JetBrains IDEs support: Intelligent Tailwind CSS completions. field-sizing-fixed: fixed field-sizing-content: content fill classes: fill-none, fill-inherit, fill-current, fill-transparent, fill-black, fill-white, fill-red-50...fill-rose-950, fill-(), fill-[]. Set SVG fill color. Property: fill. Color options: none, inherit, current, transparent, black, white, red to rose color palettes, custom-property, custom color value. filter: Class names: filter-none, filter-(<custom-property>), filter-[<value>]. Applies CSS filters (blur, brightness, etc.). filter-none removes all filters. Supports custom values and CSS variables. Responsive design supported. blur-xs filter: blur(var(--blur-xs)); blur-sm filter: blur(var(--blur-sm)); blur-md filter: blur(var(--blur-md)); blur-lg filter: blur(var(--blur-lg)); blur-xl filter: blur(var(--blur-xl)); blur-2xl filter: blur(var(--blur-2xl)); blur-3xl filter: blur(var(--blur-3xl)); blur-none filter: ; blur-(custom-property) filter: blur(var(custom-property)); blur-[value] filter: blur(value); Use blur-sm, blur-lg to blur. blur-[value] for custom values. md: applies at medium screen sizes. brightness-: predefined brightness. brightness-[value]: custom value. brightness-(custom-property): custom property. contrast-[number] contrast-(custom-property) contrast-[value] filter: contrast() Control element contrast. Filter Drop Shadow: drop-shadow-xs: filter: drop-shadow(var(--drop-shadow-xs)); drop-shadow-sm: filter: drop-shadow(var(--drop-shadow-sm)); drop-shadow-md: filter: drop-shadow(var(--drop-shadow-md)); drop-shadow-lg: filter: drop-shadow(var(--drop-shadow-lg)); drop-shadow-xl: filter: drop-shadow(var(--drop-shadow-xl)); drop-shadow-2xl: filter: drop-shadow(var(--drop-shadow-2xl)); drop-shadow-none: filter: drop-shadow(0 0 #0000); drop-shadow-(custom-property): var(custom-property); drop-shadow-[value]: value;. Example: <svg class=\"drop-shadow-md\">. Custom value: drop-shadow-[0_35px_35px_rgba(0,0,0,0.25)]. Responsive: md:drop-shadow-xl. Theme: --drop-shadow-3xl. grayscale: filter: grayscale(100%); grayscale-number: filter: grayscale(number%); grayscale-(custom-property): filter: grayscale(var(custom-property)); grayscale-[value]: filter: grayscale(value); Use breakpoint variants like md:grayscale-0 for responsive design. Tailwind Hue Rotate: `hue-rotate-{number}`, `-hue-rotate-{number}`, `hue-rotate-{custom-property}`, `hue-rotate-[value]`. Rotate hue by degrees. Negative values, custom values, responsive design supported. ClassStyles invert filter: invert(100%); invert- filter: invert(%); invert-() filter: invert(var()); invert-[] filter: invert(); Utilities to control color inversion. saturate-number: filter: saturate(number%); saturate-(custom-property): filter: saturate(var(custom-property)); saturate-[value]: filter: saturate(value); sepia: filter: sepia(100%); sepia-number: filter: sepia(number%); sepia-(custom-property): filter: sepia(var(custom-property)); sepia-[value]: filter: sepia(value); Use breakpoint variants like md:sepia-0 for responsive design. Tailwind Flexbox Utilities: `flex-{number}`, `flex-{fraction}`, `flex-auto`, `flex-initial`, `flex-none`, `flex-{custom-property}`, `flex-[value]`. Control flex item growth/shrink. Responsive design via prefixes (e.g., `md:`). flex-basis: Class names: basis-<number>, basis-<fraction>, basis-full, basis-auto, basis-3xs-basis-7xl, basis-(<custom-property>), basis-[<value>]. Sets flex-basis using spacing, container, percentage, or custom values. Responsive design supported. flex-row sets flex-direction: row. flex-row-reverse sets flex-direction: row-reverse. flex-col sets flex-direction: column. flex-col-reverse sets flex-direction: column-reverse. md:flex-row/... for responsive design. Example: flex-row flex-col. grow: flex-grow: 1; grow-number: flex-grow: number; grow-[value]: flex-grow: value; grow-(custom-property): flex-grow: var(custom-property); shrink sets flex-shrink: 1. shrink-0 sets flex-shrink: 0. shrink-number sets flex-shrink. shrink-[value] and shrink-(custom-property) for custom values. md:shrink-... for responsive design. Example: shrink shrink-0. Tailwind Flex Wrap: `flex-nowrap`, `flex-wrap`, `flex-wrap-reverse`. Control wrapping behavior of flex items. Responsive design via prefixes (e.g., `md:`). float-right float-left float-start float-end float-none float: Control element floating. font-sans: `var(--font-sans)` font-serif: `var(--font-serif)` font-mono: `var(--font-mono)` font-(family-name:<custom-property>): `var(<custom-property>)` font-[<value>]: `<value>` Responsive design: prefix with breakpoint variants (e.g., `md:font-serif`). Customizing theme: Use `--font-*` theme variables. Custom fonts: Use `@font-face`. Google Fonts: `@import` before other rules. text-xs-text-9xl: predefined font sizes. text-[value]: custom font size. text-(length:custom-property): custom property. Use text-size/line-height to set both. antialiased -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; subpixel-antialiased -webkit-font-smoothing: auto; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: auto; Use antialiased for grayscale, subpixel-antialiased for subpixel antialiasing. md: applies at medium screen sizes. font-stretch-ultra-condensed font-stretch: ultra-condensed; font-stretch-extra-condensed font-stretch: extra-condensed; font-stretch-condensed font-stretch: condensed; font-stretch-semi-condensed font-stretch: semi-condensed; font-stretch-normal font-stretch: normal; font-stretch-semi-expanded font-stretch: semi-expanded; font-stretch-expanded font-stretch: expanded; font-stretch-extra-expanded font-stretch: extra-expanded; font-stretch-ultra-expanded font-stretch: ultra-expanded; font-stretch-[percentage] font-stretch: percentage; font-stretch-(custom-property) font-stretch: var(custom-property); font-stretch-[value] font-stretch: value; Use font-stretch utilities to set font width. Responsive design with md:font-stretch-expanded. Class: italic, not-italic. Purpose: Control font style (italic/normal). Responsive design supported. normal-nums: font-variant-numeric: normal; ordinal: ordinal; slashed-zero: slashed-zero; lining-nums: lining-nums; oldstyle-nums: oldstyle-nums; proportional-nums: proportional-nums; tabular-nums: tabular-nums; diagonal-fractions: diagonal-fractions; stacked-fractions: stacked-fractions; Use md: for responsive design. Font Weight: font-thin: font-weight: 100; font-extralight: 200; font-light: 300; font-normal: 400; font-medium: 500; font-semibold: 600; font-bold: 700; font-extrabold: 800; font-black: 900; font-(custom-property): var(custom-property); font-[value]: value;. Example: <p class=\"font-light\">. Custom value: font-[1000]. Responsive: md:font-bold. Theme customization: --font-weight-extrablack: 1000. forced-color-adjust-auto: auto; forced-color-adjust-none: none. Responsive: md:forced-color-adjust-auto. Directives: @import, @theme, @source, @utility, @variant, @custom-variant, @apply, @reference, @config, @plugin. Functions: --alpha(), --spacing(), theme(). Description: Tailwind CSS directives and functions. gap- sets gap for grid/flexbox. Values: number (spacing scale multiplier), custom-property, arbitrary-value. gap-x- sets column-gap. gap-y- sets row-gap. auto-cols-auto: grid-auto-columns auto auto-cols-min: grid-auto-columns min-content auto-cols-max: grid-auto-columns max-content auto-cols-fr: grid-auto-columns minmax(0,1fr) auto-cols-({custom-property}): grid-auto-columns var({custom-property}) auto-cols-[value]: grid-auto-columns [value] grid-flow-row: grid-auto-flow: row; grid-flow-col: grid-auto-flow: column; grid-flow-dense: grid-auto-flow: dense; grid-flow-row-dense: grid-auto-flow: row dense; grid-flow-col-dense: grid-auto-flow: column dense; Controls auto-placement algorithm for grid layout. Use md: for responsive design. auto-rows-auto sets grid-auto-rows: auto. auto-rows-min sets grid-auto-rows: min-content. auto-rows-max sets grid-auto-rows: max-content. auto-rows-fr sets grid-auto-rows: minmax(0 1fr). auto-rows-[value] and auto-rows-(custom-property) for custom values. md:auto-rows-... for responsive design. Example: auto-rows-min auto-rows-max. col-span-{number}: grid-column span {number} col-span-full: grid-column 1/-1 col-start-{number}: grid-column-start {number} col-start-auto: grid-column-start auto col-end-{number}: grid-column-end {number} col-end-auto: grid-column-end auto col-auto: grid-column auto col-{number}: grid-column {number} col-{custom-property}: grid-column var({custom-property}) col-[value]: grid-column [value] Classes: row-span-, row-span-full, row-span-(), row-span-[], row-start-, -row-start-, row-start-auto, row-start-(), row-start-[], row-end-, -row-end-, row-end-auto, row-end-(), row-end-[], row-auto, row-, -row-, row-(), row-[]. Purpose: Control grid row size and position. Custom values and CSS variables supported. Responsive design supported. grid-cols-: repeat(, minmax(0, 1fr)); grid-cols-none: none; grid-cols-subgrid: subgrid; grid-cols-[]: ; grid-cols-(): var(). Responsive: md:grid-cols-6. grid-rows-<number>: creates n equally sized rows; grid-rows-none, grid-rows-subgrid; grid-rows-[<value>]: custom row value; grid-rows-(): custom CSS variable; responsive design via prefixes h-: fixed height. h-: percentage height. h-auto|px|full|screen|dvh|lvh|svh|min|max|fit: height units. h-[value]: custom value. h-(custom-property): custom property. size-*: set width and height. hyphens-none: hyphens: none; hyphens-manual: hyphens: manual; hyphens-auto: hyphens: auto; Use &shy; for manual hyphen points. Example: <p class=\"hyphens-auto\" lang=\"de\">...</p>. Use md: for responsive design. Framework Guides: Next.js Laravel Nuxt SolidJS SvelteKit Angular Ruby on Rails React Router Phoenix Parcel Symfony Meteor AdonisJS Ember.js Astro Qwik Rspack. Framework-specific guides for Tailwind CSS installation. Install Tailwind CSS in AdonisJS project. npm init adonisjs@latest my-project -- --kit=web; cd my-project; npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite; Configure Vite: import tailwindcss from '@tailwindcss/vite'; plugins: [tailwindcss(), adonisjs()]; Import CSS: @import \"tailwindcss\"; @source \"../views\"; Use: npm run dev; <h1 class=\"text-3xl font-bold underline\">Hello world!</h1>. Angular installation: 1. ng new my-project --style css; cd my-project 2. npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/postcss postcss --force 3. Create .postcssrc.json: { \"plugins\": { \"@tailwindcss/postcss\": {} } } 4. Import in ./src/styles.css: @import \"tailwindcss\"; 5. ng serve 6. Use Tailwind classes in components. Create Astro project: npm create astro@latest my-project. Install Tailwind: npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite. Configure Astro: Add tailwindcss() to astro.config.mjs. Import Tailwind: @import \"tailwindcss\" in ./src/styles/global.css. Build: npm run dev. Use Tailwind classes. Installation steps for Ember.js: create project, install packages (@tailwindcss/postcss, postcss, postcss-loader), configure PostCSS, import Tailwind CSS, import CSS file, build and run. Install tailwindcss, @tailwindcss/postcss, postcss. Add tailwindcss to webpack.mix.js as PostCSS plugin. @import \"tailwindcss\"; @source \"../views\"; npm run watch. Laravel Vite Tailwind Installation: Create Laravel project, install `tailwindcss`, `@tailwindcss/vite`. Configure Vite plugin: add `tailwindcss()` to `vite.config.ts`. Import Tailwind: `@import \"tailwindcss\"; @source \"../views\";` in `app.css`. Build: `npm run dev`. Use Tailwind classes. Meteor Tailwind Installation: Create Meteor project. Install `tailwindcss`, `@tailwindcss/postcss`, `postcss`, `postcss-load-config`. Configure PostCSS in `postcss.config.mjs`. Import Tailwind in `main.css`. Build: `npm run start`. Use Tailwind classes. Installation steps for Next.js: Create project, Install Tailwind CSS, Configure PostCSS, Import Tailwind CSS, Start build, Use Tailwind. Commands: npx create-next-app, npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/postcss postcss, npm run dev. create Nuxt project; install @tailwindcss/vite; add @tailwindcss/vite plugin to Nuxt config; @import \"tailwindcss\" in main.css; add main.css to nuxt.config.ts; npm run dev; use Tailwind utility classes Install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/postcss. Configure PostCSS: .postcssrc { \"plugins\": { \"@tailwindcss/postcss\": {} }}. Import Tailwind CSS: @import \"tailwindcss\"; Run build: npx parcel src/index.html. Use Tailwind: <link href=\"./index.css\" type=\"text/css\" rel=\"stylesheet\" /> Phoenix Tailwind Installation: Create Phoenix project. Add Tailwind plugin to `mix.exs`. Configure plugin in `config.exs`. Update deployment script in `mix.exs`. Enable watcher in `dev.exs`. Install Tailwind CLI: `mix tailwind.install`. Import Tailwind in `app.css`. Remove default CSS import from `app.js`. Build: `mix phx.server`. Create Qwik project: npm create qwik@latest empty my-project. Install Tailwind: npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite. Configure Vite: Add @tailwindcss/vite plugin to vite.config.ts. Import Tailwind: @import \"tailwindcss\" in ./src/global.css. Build: npm run dev. Use Tailwind classes. create React Router project; install @tailwindcss/vite; add @tailwindcss/vite plugin to Vite config; @import \"tailwindcss\"; npm run dev; use Tailwind utility classes Rspack React Installation 1. npm create rspack@latest 2. npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/postcss postcss postcss-loader 3. rspack.config.ts: module:{rules:[{test:/\\.css$/,use:[\"postcss-loader\"],type:\"css\",}]} 4. postcss.config.mjs: plugins:{\"@tailwindcss/postcss\":{}} 5. index.css: @import \"tailwindcss\"; 6. npm run dev 7. Use Tailwind classes in project. create Rspack project; install @tailwindcss/postcss; enable PostCSS loader; add @tailwindcss/postcss plugin to postcss.config.mjs; @import \"tailwindcss\"; npm run dev; use Tailwind utility classes Rails installation: bundle add tailwindcss-ruby; bundle add tailwindcss-rails; ./bin/rails tailwindcss:install; ./bin/dev; Use Tailwind utility classes to style. Create SolidJS project: npx degit solidjs/templates/js my-project. Install Tailwind: npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite. Configure Vite: Add @tailwindcss/vite plugin to vite.config.ts. Import Tailwind: @import \"tailwindcss\" in ./src/index.css. Build: npm run dev. Use Tailwind classes. Install Tailwind CSS in SvelteKit project. npx create my-project; cd my-project; npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite; Configure Vite: import tailwindcss from '@tailwindcss/vite'; plugins: [tailwindcss(), sveltekit()]; Import CSS: @import \"tailwindcss\"; Use: npm run dev; <h1 class=\"text-3xl font-bold underline\">Hello world!</h1>. Symfony Installation: 1. Create Symfony project. 2. Install Webpack Encore. 3. Install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/postcss postcss postcss-loader. 4. Enable PostCSS Loader in webpack.config.js. 5. Configure postcss.config.mjs with @tailwindcss/postcss. 6. Import Tailwind CSS in app.css. 7. Run npm run watch. 8. Use Tailwind classes in HTML. Symfony installation guide with Webpack Encore. Play CDN: Add <script src=\"https://unpkg.com/@tailwindcss/browser@4\"></script> to HTML <head>. Use type=\"text/tailwindcss\" for custom CSS. install tailwindcss and @tailwindcss/cli; @import \"tailwindcss\"; npx @tailwindcss/cli -i -o --watch; add compiled CSS to <head>; use Tailwind utility classes install tailwindcss, @tailwindcss/postcss, postcss via npm; add @tailwindcss/postcss to postcss config; @import \"tailwindcss\"; run build process; use Tailwind utility classes in HTML Vite Installation: 1. npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite 2. Add tailwindcss() to vite.config.ts plugins. 3. @import \"tailwindcss\" in CSS. 4. npm run dev. 5. Link compiled CSS in HTML <head>. isolate: creates new stacking context; isolation-auto: default behavior; responsive design via prefixes Tailwind Justify Content: `justify-start`, `justify-end`, `justify-center`, `justify-between`, `justify-around`, `justify-evenly`, `justify-stretch`, `justify-baseline`, `justify-normal`. Control item alignment within flex containers. Responsive design via prefixes (e.g., `md:`). justify-items-start: start justify-items-end: end justify-items-center: center justify-items-stretch: stretch justify-items-normal: normal justify-self-auto: auto; justify-self-start: start; justify-self-end: end; justify-self-center: center; justify-self-stretch: stretch. Responsive: md:justify-self-end. tracking-tighter: letter-spacing: var(--tracking-tighter); tracking-tight: letter-spacing: var(--tracking-tight); tracking-normal: letter-spacing: var(--tracking-normal); tracking-wide: letter-spacing: var(--tracking-wide); tracking-wider: letter-spacing: var(--tracking-wider); tracking-widest: letter-spacing: var(--tracking-widest); tracking-(custom-property): letter-spacing: var(custom-property); tracking-[value]: letter-spacing: value; Use breakpoint variants like md:tracking-wide for responsive design. line-clamp- truncates multi-line text after number of lines. line-clamp-none undoes clamping. Values: number, custom-property, arbitrary-value. text-size/number: font-size: size; line-height: calc(var(--spacing) * number); text-size/(custom-property): font-size: size; line-height: var(custom-property); text-size/[value]: font-size: size; line-height: value; leading-none: line-height: 1; leading-number: line-height: calc(var(--spacing) * number); leading-(custom-property): line-height: var(custom-property); leading-[value]: line-height: value; Classes: list-image-[value], list-image-(custom-property), list-image-none. Styles: list-style-image. Description: Control marker image for list items. Classes: list-inside, list-outside. Purpose: Control list style position (inside/outside). Responsive design supported. list-disc: disc; list-decimal: decimal; list-none: none; list-(): var(); list-[]: . Responsive: md:list-disc. m-, mx-, my-, ms-, me-, mt-, mr-, mb-, ml- sets margin. Values: number (spacing scale multiplier), px, auto, custom-property, arbitrary-value. - prefix for negative margin. mx- sets margin-inline, my- sets margin-block, ms- margin-inline-start, me- margin-inline-end, mt- margin-top, mr- margin-right, mb- margin-bottom, ml- margin-left. space-x-, space-y- sets space between children. space-x-reverse, space-y-reverse reverses direction. ClassStyles max-h- max-height: calc(var(--spacing) * ); max-h- max-height: calc( * 100%); max-h-none max-height: none; max-h-px max-height: 1px; max-h-full max-height: 100%; max-h-screen max-height: 100vh; max-h-dvh max-height: 100dvh; max-h-dvw max-height: 100dvw; max-h-lvh max-height: 100lvh; max-h-lvw max-height: 100lvw; max-h-svh max-height: 100svh; max-h-svw max-height: 100svw; max-h-min max-height: min-content; max-h-max max-height: max-content; max-h-fit max-height: fit-content; max-h-() max-height: var(); max-h-[] max-height: ; Utilities to set max-height. max-w-{number}: max-width: calc(var(--spacing) * {number}) max-w-{fraction}: max-width: calc({fraction} * 100%) max-w-none: max-width: none max-w-full: max-width: 100% max-w-[value]: max-width: {value} max-w-(custom-property): max-width: var({custom-property}) min-h- sets min-height style. Values: number (spacing scale multiplier), fraction (percentage), px, full (100%), screen (100vh), dvh, dvw, lvh, lvw, svw, svh, auto, min, max, fit, custom-property, arbitrary-value. min-w-number min-width: calc(var(--spacing) * number); min-w-fraction min-width: calc(fraction * 100%); min-w-3xs min-width: var(--container-3xs); min-w-2xs min-width: var(--container-2xs); min-w-xs min-width: var(--container-xs); min-w-sm min-width: var(--container-sm); min-w-md min-width: var(--container-md); min-w-lg min-width: var(--container-lg); min-w-xl min-width: var(--container-xl); min-w-2xl min-width: var(--container-2xl); min-w-3xl min-width: var(--container-3xl); min-w-4xl min-width: var(--container-4xl); min-w-5xl min-width: var(--container-5xl); min-w-6xl min-width: var(--container-6xl); min-w-7xl min-width: var(--container-7xl); min-w-auto min-width: auto; min-w-px min-width: 1px; min-w-full min-width: 100%; min-w-screen min-width: 100vw; min-w-dvw min-width: 100dvw; min-w-dvh min-width: 100dvh;min-w-lvw min-width: 100lvw;min-w-lvh min-width: 100lvh;min-w-svw min-width: 100svw;min-w-svh min-width: 100svh; min-w-min min-width: min-content; min-w-max min-width: max-content; min-w-fit min-width: fit-content; min-w-(custom-property) min-width: var(custom-property); min-w-[value] min-width: value; Use min-w-number for spacing scale, min-w-full for 100%, min-w-[value] for custom. md: applies at medium screen sizes. mix-blend-normal mix-blend-multiply mix-blend-screen mix-blend-overlay mix-blend-darken mix-blend-lighten mix-blend-color-dodge mix-blend-color-burn mix-blend-hard-light mix-blend-soft-light mix-blend-difference mix-blend-exclusion mix-blend-hue mix-blend-saturation mix-blend-color mix-blend-luminosity mix-blend-plus-darker mix-blend-plus-lighter mix-blend-mode: Control element blend mode. object-contain: object-fit contain object-cover: object-fit cover object-fill: object-fit fill object-none: object-fit none object-scale-down: object-fit scale-down object-bottom: object-position: bottom; object-center: object-position: center; object-left: object-position: left; object-left-bottom: object-position: left bottom; object-left-top: object-position: left top; object-right: object-position: right; object-right-bottom: object-position: right bottom; object-right-top: object-position: right top; object-top: object-position: top; object-(custom-property): object-position: var(custom-property); object-[value]: object-position: value; opacity-: predefined opacity. opacity-[value]: custom value. opacity-(custom-property): custom property. order-number sets order value. -order-number sets negative order. order-first sets order to -infinity. order-last sets order to infinity. order-none sets order to 0. order-(custom-property) and order-[value] for custom values. md:order-... for responsive design. Example: order-1 order-last. Class Styles: outline-inherit: outline-color: inherit; outline-current: outline-color: currentColor; outline-transparent: outline-color: transparent; Colors: outline-{color}-{50-950}: outline-color: var(--color-{color}-{50-950}); outline-(custom-property): outline-color: var(custom-property); outline-[value]: outline-color: value; Opacity: outline-{color}-{500}/[0-100] Use color opacity modifier. Responsive: md:outline-blue-400 ... Apply at medium screen sizes and above. Theme Customization: Use --color-* variables to customize. Example: <button class=\"outline-2 outline-offset-2 outline-blue-500\">Button</button> outline-offset classes: outline-offset-, -outline-offset-, outline-offset-(), outline-offset-[]. Control outline offset. Property: outline-offset. outline-solid: outline-style: solid; outline-dashed: outline-style: dashed; outline-dotted: outline-style: dotted; outline-double: outline-style: double; outline-none: outline-style: none; outline-hidden: hides outline, shows in forced colors mode; Classes: outline, outline-number, outline-(length:custom-property), outline-[value]. Styles: outline-width. Description: Set element outline width. overflow-auto: overflow: auto; overflow-hidden: overflow: hidden; overflow-clip: overflow: clip; overflow-visible: overflow: visible; overflow-scroll: overflow: scroll; overflow-x-auto: overflow-x: auto; overflow-y-auto: overflow-y: auto; overflow-x-hidden: overflow-x: hidden; overflow-y-hidden: overflow-y: hidden; overflow-x-clip: overflow-x: clip; overflow-y-clip: overflow-y: clip; overflow-x-visible: overflow-x: visible; overflow-y-visible: overflow-y: visible; overflow-x-scroll: overflow-x: scroll; overflow-y-scroll: overflow-y: scroll; Use overflow-visible to prevent clipping. Use overflow-hidden to clip content. Use overflow-auto for scrollbars when needed. Use overflow-x-auto, overflow-y-auto for specific directions. Use overflow-x-scroll, overflow-y-scroll to always show scrollbars. Responsive: md:overflow-* ClassStyles overscroll-auto overscroll-behavior: auto; overscroll-contain overscroll-behavior: contain; overscroll-none overscroll-behavior: none; overscroll-x-auto overscroll-behavior-x: auto; overscroll-x-contain overscroll-behavior-x: contain; overscroll-x-none overscroll-behavior-x: none; overscroll-y-auto overscroll-behavior-y: auto; overscroll-y-contain overscroll-behavior-y: contain; overscroll-y-none overscroll-behavior-y: none; Utilities to control overscroll. contain: prevent parent scroll, none: no bounce. p-<number>: padding: calc(var(--spacing) * <number>); p-px: 1px; p-(<custom-property>): var(<custom-property>); p-[<value>]: <value>; px-*: padding-inline; py-*: padding-block; ps-*: padding-inline-start; pe-*: padding-inline-end; pt-*: padding-top; pr-*: padding-right; pb-*: padding-bottom; pl-*: padding-left. Responsive: md:py-8. perspective-dramatic: 100px; perspective-near: 300px; perspective-normal: 500px; perspective-midrange: 800px; perspective-distant: 1200px; perspective-none: none; perspective-(): var(); perspective-[]: ; Removes perspective: perspective-none; Custom value: perspective-[750px]; CSS variable: perspective-(--my-perspective); Responsive design: md:perspective-dramatic; perspective-origin-center perspective-origin: center; perspective-origin-top perspective-origin: top; perspective-origin-top-right perspective-origin: top right; perspective-origin-right perspective-origin: right; perspective-origin-bottom-right perspective-origin: bottom right; perspective-origin-bottom perspective-origin: bottom; perspective-origin-bottom-left perspective-origin: bottom left; perspective-origin-left perspective-origin: left; perspective-origin-top-left perspective-origin: top left; perspective-origin-(custom-property) perspective-origin: var(custom-property); perspective-origin-[value] perspective-origin: value; Use perspective-origin-top, perspective-origin-bottom-left to control vanishing point. perspective-origin-[value] for custom values. md: applies at medium screen sizes. place-content-{center,start,end,between,around,evenly,baseline,stretch}: controls item placement; responsive design via prefixes place-items-start: start place-items-end: end place-items-center: center place-items-baseline: baseline place-items-stretch: stretch place-self-auto: place-self: auto; place-self-start: place-self: start; place-self-end: place-self: end; place-self-center: place-self: center; place-self-stretch: place-self: stretch; Aligns item based on container's place-items property. Use md: for responsive design. pointer-events-auto: auto; pointer-events-none: none; Ignores pointer events: pointer-events-none; Restores pointer events: pointer-events-auto; Responsive design: md:pointer-events-auto; static, fixed, absolute, relative, sticky classes set position property. static: normal flow. fixed: viewport relative. absolute: nearest positioned ancestor relative. relative: normal flow, relative to itself. sticky: relative until threshold then fixed. Preflight: base styles, removes default margins, resets border styles, unstyles headings and lists. Images: block-level, constrained to parent width. Extend with @layer base. Disable by omitting import. resize-none: Prevents resizing. resize: Resizes both directions. resize-y: Resizes vertically. resize-x: Resizes horizontally. Example: <textarea class=\"resize rounded-md\"></textarea> Responsive design: Prefix utilities with breakpoint (sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl). Mobile-first. Custom breakpoints via theme variables. Range targeting: Combine responsive and max-* variants. Arbitrary values supported. Container queries: @container class, @variants. Custom container sizes via theme variables. Arbitrary container values supported. cqw unit for container size reference. rotate: Class names: rotate-none, rotate-<number>, -rotate-<number>, rotate-(<custom-property>), rotate-[<value>], rotate-x-<number>, -rotate-x-<number>, rotate-x-(<custom-property>), rotate-x-[<value>], rotate-y-<number>, -rotate-y-<number>, rotate-y-(<custom-property>), rotate-y-[<value>], rotate-z-<number>, -rotate-z-<number>, rotate-z-(<custom-property>), rotate-z-[<value>]. Rotates elements by degrees; supports negative values and 3D rotation. Uses custom values and CSS variables. Responsive design supported. Classes: scale-none, scale-number, -scale-number, scale-(custom-property), scale-[value], scale-x-number, -scale-x-number, scale-x-(custom-property), scale-x-[value], scale-y-number, -scale-y-number, scale-y-(custom-property), scale-y-[value], scale-z-number, -scale-z-number, scale-z-(custom-property), scale-z-[value], scale-3d. Styles: scale. Description: Scale element size by percentage or custom values in x, y, z or all directions. Classes: scroll-auto, scroll-smooth. Styles: scroll-behavior. Description: Control element scroll behavior, smooth or auto. scroll-m-{number}: scroll-margin: calc(var(--spacing) * {number}); -scroll-m-{number}: scroll-margin: calc(var(--spacing) * -{number}); scroll-m-(custom-property): scroll-margin: var(custom-property); scroll-m-[value]: scroll-margin: value; scroll-mx-*, scroll-my-*, scroll-ms-*, scroll-me-*, scroll-mt-*, scroll-mr-*, scroll-mb-*, scroll-ml-*: scroll-margin-*: calc(var(--spacing) * {number}); scroll-margin-*: var(custom-property); scroll-margin-*: value; Negative values: -scroll-m-*. Logical properties: scroll-ms-*, scroll-me-*. Custom values: scroll-ml-[value], scroll-ml-(--var). Responsive: md:scroll-m-* scroll-p-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-px-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-py-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-ps-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-pe-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-pt-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-pr-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-pb-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); scroll-pl-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); Negative values: -scroll-p-; Custom value: scroll-pl-[24rem]; CSS variable: scroll-pl-(--my-scroll-padding); Responsive design: md:scroll-p-0; Scroll Snap Align: snap-start: scroll-snap-align: start; snap-end: scroll-snap-align: end; snap-center: scroll-snap-align: center; snap-align-none: scroll-snap-align: none;. Example: <div class=\"snap-x\"> <div class=\"snap-center\"><img src=\"...\"/></div> </div>. Responsive: md:snap-start. Classes: snap-normal, snap-always. Purpose: Control scroll snap stop behavior (normal/always). Responsive design supported. scroll-snap-type: Class names: snap-none, snap-x, snap-y, snap-both, snap-mandatory, snap-proximity. Controls scroll snapping behavior (none, x, y, both). snap-mandatory and snap-proximity specify strictness. Responsive design supported. skew-number: transform: skewX(number deg) skewY(number deg); -skew-number: transform: skewX(-number deg) skewY(-number deg); skew-(custom-property): transform: skewX(var(custom-property)) skewY(var(custom-property)); skew-[value]: transform: skewX(value) skewY(value); skew-x-number: transform: skewX(number deg); -skew-x-number: transform: skewX(-number deg); skew-x-(custom-property): transform: skewX(var(custom-property)); skew-x-[value]: transform: skewX(value); skew-y-number: transform: skewY(number deg); -skew-y-number: transform: skewY(-number deg); skew-y-(custom-property): transform: skewY(var(custom-property)); skew-y-[value]: transform: skewY(value); stroke-none stroke: none; stroke-inherit stroke: inherit; stroke-current stroke: currentColor; stroke-transparent stroke: transparent; stroke-black stroke: var(--color-black); stroke-white stroke: var(--color-white); stroke-red-* stroke: var(--color-red-*); stroke-orange-* stroke: var(--color-orange-*); stroke-amber-* stroke: var(--color-amber-*); stroke-yellow-* stroke: var(--color-yellow-*); stroke-lime-* stroke: var(--color-lime-*); stroke-green-* stroke: var(--color-green-*); stroke-emerald-* stroke: var(--color-emerald-*); stroke-teal-* stroke: var(--color-teal-*); stroke-cyan-* stroke: var(--color-cyan-*); stroke-sky-* stroke: var(--color-sky-*); stroke-blue-* stroke: var(--color-blue-*); stroke-indigo-* stroke: var(--color-indigo-*); stroke-violet-* stroke: var(--color-violet-*); stroke-purple-* stroke: var(--color-purple-*); stroke-fuchsia-* stroke: var(--color-fuchsia-*); stroke-pink-* stroke: var(--color-pink-*); stroke-rose-* stroke: var(--color-rose-*); stroke-slate-* stroke: var(--color-slate-*); stroke-gray-* stroke: var(--color-gray-*); stroke-zinc-* stroke: var(--color-zinc-*); stroke-neutral-* stroke: var(--color-neutral-*); stroke-stone-* stroke: var(--color-stone-*); stroke-(custom-property) stroke: var(custom-property); stroke-[color] stroke: color; Use stroke utilities to set svg stroke color. stroke-current sets to text color. Responsive design with md:stroke-cyan-700. stroke-<number>: stroke-width: <number>; stroke-(length:<custom-property>): stroke-width: var(<custom-property>); stroke-[<value>]: stroke-width: <value>; Example: <svg class=\"stroke-1 ...\"></svg>. Use md: for responsive design. Style using utility classes. Variants: hover:, focus:, dark:, sm:. Arbitrary values: bg-[#316ff6]. Complex selectors: dark:lg:data-current:hover:bg-indigo-600. group-hover: style element on parent hover. Arbitrary variants: [>[data-active]+span]:text-blue-600. Inline styles for dynamic values. CSS: @layer components { .btn-primary { &:hover { }}}. !important modifier: bg-red-500!. important flag: @import \"tailwindcss\" important;. prefix option: prefix(tw). table-auto: Auto sizes columns. table-fixed: Uses fixed column widths. Example: <table class=\"table-auto\"></table> text-left: text-align: left; text-center: text-align: center; text-right: text-align: right; text-justify: text-align: justify; text-start: text-align: start; text-end: text-align: end; Use breakpoint variants like md:text-center for responsive design. decoration-inherit text-decoration-color: inherit; decoration-current text-decoration-color: currentColor; decoration-transparent text-decoration-color: transparent; decoration-black text-decoration-color: var(--color-black); decoration-white text-decoration-color: var(--color-white); decoration-red-* text-decoration-color: var(--color-red-*); ... (other colors) ... decoration-(custom-property) text-decoration-color: var(custom-property); decoration-[value] text-decoration-color: value; Use decoration-* to set color. Opacity via decoration-color/opacity. decoration-[value] for custom values. hover: applies on hover. md: applies at medium screen sizes. Tailwind Text Decoration: `underline`, `overline`, `line-through`, `no-underline`. Control text decoration. Responsive design and hover states supported via prefixes (e.g., `hover:`, `md:`). decoration-solid: solid; decoration-double: double; decoration-dotted: dotted; decoration-dashed: dashed; decoration-wavy: wavy. Responsive: md:decoration-dashed. decoration-{number}: text-decoration-thickness: {number}px decoration-from-font: text-decoration-thickness: from-font decoration-auto: text-decoration-thickness: auto decoration-(custom-property): text-decoration-thickness: var({custom-property}) decoration-[value]: text-decoration-thickness: {value} indent-{number}: text-indent: calc(var(--spacing) * {number}); -indent-{number}: text-indent: calc(var(--spacing) * -{number}); indent-px: text-indent: 1px; -indent-px: text-indent: -1px; indent-([value]): text-indent: [value]; Sets indentation of text block. Use -indent to use negative values. Use indent-[value] for custom values. Use md: for responsive design. truncate: overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; text-ellipsis: text-overflow: ellipsis; text-clip: text-overflow: clip; uppercase: uppercase text. lowercase: lowercase text. capitalize: capitalize text. normal-case: preserve original casing. underline-offset-[number] -underline-offset-[number] underline-offset-auto underline-offset-(custom-property) underline-offset-[value] text-underline-offset: Control text underline offset. text-wrap: text-wrap: wrap; text-nowrap: text-wrap: nowrap; text-balance: text-wrap: balance; text-pretty: text-wrap: pretty; wrap: allow text to wrap; nowrap: prevent wrapping; balance: Distribute text evenly across lines (limited to ~6 lines); pretty: prevent orphans. Use md: for responsive design. Theme variables are CSS variables defined with @theme, influencing utility classes. Example: @theme { --color-mint-500: oklch(0.72 0.11 178); } creates bg-mint-500, text-mint-500, fill-mint-500. Namespaces: --color-*, --font-*, --text-*, --font-weight-*, --tracking-*, --leading-*, --breakpoint-*, --container-*, --spacing-*, --radius-*, --shadow-*, --inset-shadow-*, --drop-shadow-*, --blur-*, --perspective-*, --aspect-*, --ease-*, --animate-*. Use @theme inline for variables referencing other variables. Use @theme static to generate all CSS variables. inset-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); inset-x-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); inset-y-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); start-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); end-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); top-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); right-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); bottom-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); left-: calc(var(--spacing) * ); Negative values: -inset-; Fractions: inset-; full: inset-full; auto: inset-auto; Custom value: inset-[3px]; CSS variable: inset-(--my-position); Logical properties: start-, end-; Responsive design: md:top-6; touch-auto touch-none touch-pan-x touch-pan-left touch-pan-right touch-pan-y touch-pan-up touch-pan-down touch-pinch-zoom touch-manipulation touch-action: Control touch scrolling and zooming. Classes: transform-(), transform-[], transform-none, transform-gpu, transform-cpu. Purpose: Apply transforms, remove transforms, control hardware acceleration. Custom values and CSS variables supported. Responsive design supported. origin-center: transform-origin center origin-{position}: transform-origin {position} origin-({custom-property}): transform-origin var({custom-property}) origin-[value]: transform-origin [value] transform-3d: preserve-3d; transform-flat: flat. Responsive: md:transform-flat. transition-normal: normal transition-discrete: allow-discrete delay-: ms; delay-(): var(); delay-[]: ; Sets transition delay: delay-150; Custom value: delay-[1s,250ms]; CSS variable: delay-(--my-delay); Responsive design: md:delay-300; duration-number: transition-duration: number ms; duration-initial: transition-duration: initial; duration-(custom-property): transition-duration: var(custom-property); duration-[value]: transition-duration: value; transition classes: transition, transition-all, transition-colors, transition-opacity, transition-shadow, transition-transform, transition-none, transition-(custom-property), transition-[value]. Define CSS transition properties and durations. Properties: transition-property, transition-timing-function, transition-duration. ease-linear transition-timing-function: linear; ease-in transition-timing-function: var(--ease-in); ease-out transition-timing-function: var(--ease-out); ease-in-out transition-timing-function: var(--ease-in-out); ease-initial transition-timing-function: initial; ease-(custom-property) transition-timing-function: var(custom-property); ease-[value] transition-timing-function: value; Use ease-in, ease-out to control easing curve. ease-[value] for custom values. md: applies at medium screen sizes. translate-{number}: translate: calc(var(--spacing) * {number}) calc(var(--spacing) * {number}); -translate-{number}: translate: calc(var(--spacing) * -{number}) calc(var(--spacing) * -{number}); translate-{fraction}: translate: calc({fraction} * 100%) calc({fraction} * 100%); -translate-{fraction}: translate: calc({fraction} * -100%) calc({fraction} * -100%); translate-full: translate: 100% 100%; -translate-full: translate: -100% -100%; translate-px: translate: 1px 1px; -translate-px: translate: -1px -1px; translate-x-{value}: translate: {value} var(--tw-translate-y); translate-y-{value}: translate: var(--tw-translate-x) {value}; translate-z-{number}: translate: var(--tw-translate-x) var(--tw-translate-y) calc(var(--spacing) * {number}); translate-none: translate: none; Translates element. Use translate-x, translate-y, translate-z for specific axes. Custom values: translate-[value]. Requires transform-3d utility for translate-z. Use md: for responsive design. v4 Upgrade Guide. Use `npx @tailwindcss/upgrade` tool. PostCSS plugin: `@tailwindcss/postcss`. Vite plugin: `@tailwindcss/vite`. CLI: `@tailwindcss/cli`. Import: `@import \"tailwindcss\"`. Removed deprecated utilities: bg-opacity-* text-opacity-* border-opacity-* divide-opacity-* ring-opacity-* placeholder-opacity-* flex-shrink-* flex-grow-* overflow-ellipsis decoration-slice decoration-clone. Renamed: shadow-sm->shadow-xs shadow->shadow-sm drop-shadow-sm->drop-shadow-xs drop-shadow->drop-shadow-sm blur-sm->blur-xs blur->blur-sm backdrop-blur-sm->backdrop-blur-xs backdrop-blur->backdrop-blur-sm rounded-sm->rounded-xs rounded->rounded-sm outline-none->outline-hidden ring->ring-3. outline-none sets `outline-style: none`. ring width 1px. space-* selector updated. Gradients variants preserved. Container config `@utility container`. Default border/ring color `currentColor`. Preflight updates: placeholder button cursor dialog margins. Prefix `tw:`. Custom utilities `@utility`. Variant stacking left to right. Variables in values `()`. Hover on hover-devices. transition-color includes outline-color. corePlugins removed. theme() use CSS vars. JS config `@config`. @apply in CSS modules/Vue/Svelte use @reference/CSS vars. ClassStyles select-none user-select: none; select-text user-select: text; select-all user-select: all; select-auto user-select: auto; Utilities to control text selection. align-baseline, align-top, align-middle, align-bottom, align-text-top, align-text-bottom, align-sub, align-super; align-[<value>]: custom value; align-(): custom CSS variable; responsive design via prefixes Visibility: visible: visibility: visible; invisible: visibility: hidden; collapse: visibility: collapse;. Invisible hides, maintains space. Collapse hides table rows. Responsive: md:invisible. whitespace-normal: white-space: normal; whitespace-nowrap: white-space: nowrap; whitespace-pre: white-space: pre; whitespace-pre-line: white-space: pre-line; whitespace-pre-wrap: white-space: pre-wrap; whitespace-break-spaces: white-space: break-spaces; w-{number}: width calc(var(--spacing)*{number}) w-{fraction}: width calc({fraction}*100%) w-{size}: width var(--container-{size}) w-auto: width auto w-px: width 1px w-full: width 100% w-screen: width 100vw w-[value]: width [value] w-({custom-property}): width var({custom-property}) size-{number}: width height calc(var(--spacing)*{number}) size-{fraction}: width height calc({fraction}*100%) size-auto: width height auto size-px: width height 1px size-full: width height 100% ClassStyles will-change-auto will-change: auto; will-change-scroll will-change: scroll-position; will-change-contents will-change: contents; will-change-transform will-change: transform; will-change- will-change: var(); will-change-[] will-change: ; Optimizes element changes. Use sparingly for performance. ClassStyles break-normal overflow-wrap: normal; word-break: normal; break-words overflow-wrap: break-word; break-all word-break: break-all; break-keep word-break: keep-all; Utilities for word breaking. break-keep for CJK text. ClassStyles z- z-index: ; z-auto z-index: auto; z-[] z-index: ; z-() z-index: var(); Utilities for z-index. Negative values: -z-."
